name: Drunk Potato: A Drinking Game
description:
From the makers of Drink-O-Tron comes a brand new, fast paced drinking game!!

We took the classic Hot Potato idea, threw in some random (sometimes downright filthy) questions, a few dashes of booze, and abracadabra, you've got Drunk Potato!

Answer questions like...

-List 3 Names a Stripper Might Have
-Name 3 Famous Robots
-Name 3 Things Wrong with Your Life
-Explain Harry Potter as Fast As You Can

You get the idea!

Download it for FREE today!

Please visit our website if you have any suggestions to improve the game!

http://www.drinkotron.com/
